text: Ate muhazarina (pravasi) ate asaram (saha'ita karana vale) vica jihare loka pahilam tom hana ate jinham ne cagi'a'i nala inham da palana kita, alaha unham tom khusa ho'i'a ate uha usa tom khusa ho'e. Ate alaha ne unham la'i ajihe baga ti'ara kite hana jinham de thale nahiram vagadi'am hana uha usa vica hamesam rahinage ihi vadi safalata hai
